document.full_text: standard & poor's cut its credit rating on portugal by one notch on tuesday to just above junk status, its second downgrade in less than a week as the debt-ridden country grapples with a political crisis.
document.title: s&p cuts portugal credit rating to just above junk
lines_and_colors: standard & poor's cut its credit rating on portugal by one notch on tuesday to just above junk status, its second downgrade in less than a week as the debt-ridden country grapples with a political crisis.
